channel.title: Scenarios in translation: SHEPHERD OF MOTHS
channel.description:
The first in a line of bestselling **Call of Cthulhu** Miskatonic Repository (Polish edition) scenarios dropped today — *The Shepherd of Moths*. It's got a strong and serviceable opening and a new Mythos creature and it's got a low low price.
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/m/product/286871

item.title: Scenarios in translation: SHEPHERD OF MOTHS
item.dc:creator: @Jmstar
item.description:
@Jmstar wrote:

Hey, I know Marek! Awesome, everybody go buy this immediately!

Read full topic
